com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer
Class BurstlyBanner

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.BurstlyBaseAd
      com.burstly.lib.conveniencelayer.BurstlyBanner

public class BurstlyBanner
extends BurstlyBaseAd

A default static banner ad placement which is attached to an activity and left visible and active during the life of the Activity

public BurstlyBanner(Activity activity,
                     int id)
Constructor for a BurstlyBanner built from a BurstlyView that has been attached to a layout file

Parameters:
activity - The Activity associated with the banner
id - The id for the BurstlyView in the layout

BurstlyBanner

public BurstlyBanner(Activity activity,
                     ViewGroup group,
                     ViewGroup.LayoutParams params,
                     String zoneId,
                     String viewName,
                     int refreshRate)
Constructs a BurstlyBanner in code and attaches it to a ViewGroup

Parameters:
activity - The Activity associated with this ad
group - The ViewGroup this ad will be attached to
params - The ViewGroup.LayoutParams used to attach an ad to the ViewGroup
zoneId - The zoneId for this banner
viewName - The name of this view which will be used to identify it in teh logs
refreshRate - The number of seconds between banner refreshes (Minimum 10 seconds)

refreshRate - The number of seconds between banner refreshes (Minimum 10 seconds)
